descriptions.description: The Revision Control System (RCS) manages multiple revisions of files. RCS automates the storing, retrieval, logging, identification, and merging of revisions. RCS is useful for text that is revised frequently.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=rcs PACKAGE_VERSION=5.9.2
#oegimport ed # configure looks for it.
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.xz
mkdir -p "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}" cp AUTHORS COPYING README "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}/"
#oegpatch 001 # v1.6.0: If SA_SIGINFO, SIGHUP, SIGQUIT, SIGPIPE, SIGXCPU, SIGXFSZ are undefined. #configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --enable-threads=windows --without-libpth-prefix --with-gnu-ld
# configure: # checking for ed... no # configure: error: Could not find absolute name of original ed program: ed
# no mmap munmap functions: --disable-mmap wird ignoriert...
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --enable-threads=windows --without-libpth-prefix --with-gnu-ld --disable-rpath --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} --disable-mmap
make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
